name: Bladerite: Retribution
storyline:
Do you ever get the feeling that humanity intermittently takes battle in the war? Is there a perpetual force, shrouded in mystery, nudging things towards the darker side? Well, surprise, surprise – it's just some energy called "Lost Soul" playing puppet master.

Be it an idea, a piece of technology, a mere rock – you just can't resist attacking your kind over these things. Perhaps you've thought about getting rid of their manipulation, then welcome to the Land of Godforsaken, where it could be the graveyard of deities or the stairway for humans ascending to godhood.

The Godforsaken Lands lurks in the dreams of every being, some call it heaven, others call it the promised land, and some even label it the Bhuvarlok. This time around, the direction of things is in your hands. Tightly grip your weapons, keep your hawk's eye on the tide of souls, slay all your enemies, amass more lost soul, and become the uncrowned king of the Godforsaken Lands.

To all you heroes who venture here, remember two things:
Don't let the tide of souls steal away your warmth.
And don't settle for merely being the custodian of the world line.
summary: Bladerite offers action game enthusiasts a unique opportunity to polishing gaming skills like never before on cross-platform. Not only can you earn rewards based on defeating opponents in each match, but you can also acquire upgradeable patterns that enhance your game experience. Immerse yourself in a world where the in-game economy is supported by cryptocurrency.
